content.rendered:
Adria Motors HAS BEEN SERVICING SINCE 1974
MACCHINA HAS BEEN SERVICING NEW YORK SINCE 1989

Who we are

Owner, Mille opened Adria Motors your local German Car Repair Specialist in Long Island City in 1974 and has been serving NYC Tri-State area costumers ever since. Numerous original customers, and their children, carry on bringing their cars to us because they value the personal interest we offer over unfriendly dealership service. Did you know that local dealers add 10-15% over the suggested retail price for parts? We carry out every repair and service a dealership does but at much lower cost. We have lower overhead, so we are able to buy the best original manufacturers’ parts at the best price and pass the savings to our costumers.
Each of our technicians is highly trained and experienced. Our technically advanced equipment means you get a accurate diagnosis and repair and fast service.
contact us

team of certified technicians

We’re car people. That means you care about your car, and so do we. Our team of certified technicians will ensure you receive the best practices in the industry. Come and see for yourself. When you bring your car to us for maintenance or repair, we’ll treat you with respect and dignity. We won’t worry you with unnecessary expenses.

quality

WHY CHOOSE US

We at Adria Motors know your car is more than a tool that gets you from point A to point B, it’s your freedom. Your car lets you complete essential daily activities such as traveling to and from work, buying groceries, and picking up the children from school. You depend on it, so it’s important your car receives quality repairs and service. When you bring your car to Adria Motors, we make sure your car leaves trouble-free so you can have your freedom, and your peace of mind.
6,000+

Satisfied Clients

20+

Years of Experience

5,000+

Completed Projects

Years of Experience

We have been in the towing business over 45 years in German local location and you do not remain in organization that long unless you supply your clients with acceptable services over and over once again. Our expert tow truck operators will get here on the scene and supply you with high quality and reputable towing services to assist relieve the tension of this extremely stressful circumstance.

Expert service when you need it. We'll be there for you in time. We'll tow your car, fix it and get you back on the road. This is our guarantee to you.

get free appoitment
